products.name: Hanks
products.description: The Hanks sideboard sideboard in homage to the acclaimed actor Tom Hanks, winner of two Oscars and several other awards of immense importance. Owner of a naturalistic acting style, he manages to transition from drama to comedy with great fluidity. The actor's versatility serves as a conceptual basis for a piece that can be used in living rooms, entrance halls or wherever imagination allows. One of the legs is made of machined solid wood demonstrating the expertise that DK Mobiliário has acquired in recent years, the other base is made of MDF molded in a unique oval format, the tray applied to the top and which can be removed, expands the utility and function of the piece.

products.name: Slim
products.description: console tables serve to support the most diverse types of decorative items, whether they are fine or sophisticated, youthful and modern. It is possible to transform the sideboard into a minibar, display family photos in stylish picture frames, display works and art articles, as well as plant vases and other accessories.

products.name: Sela
products.description: The Sela bench is an example of sophisticated and contemporary furniture, with an exclusive design that evokes the elegance of classic riding saddles. Its sinuous contours adjust harmoniously to the body, giving it a unique comfort that makes it a piece of distinction and inspiration.

products.name: Vitton
products.description: chaise lounge Vitton - High quality furniture manufactured by DK furniture in Votuporanga-SP. Sophisticated and contemporary piece that values natural design and stands out for its originality and refinement.

products.name: Taylor
products.description: ottoman Taylor - High quality furniture manufactured by DK furniture in Votuporanga-SP. Sophisticated and contemporary piece that values natural design and stands out for its originality and refinement.

products.name: Tripod
products.description: bench Tripod - High quality furniture manufactured by DK furniture in Votuporanga-SP. Sophisticated and contemporary piece that values natural design and stands out for its originality and refinement.

products.name: Remo
products.description: The Remo chaise lounge was developed thinking about what structure the rowing boat, moved by human force, with its body in wood at the same time soft and robust with structural details in metal. Its shapes are natural and embrace a harmony that resembles the ocean: waves, variations, calm, and strength.

products.name: Suit
products.description: ottoman Suit - High quality furniture manufactured by DK furniture in Votuporanga-SP. Sophisticated and contemporary piece that values natural design and stands out for its originality and refinement.

products.name: OLM
products.description: ottoman OLM - High quality furniture manufactured by DK furniture in Votuporanga-SP. Sophisticated and contemporary piece that values natural design and stands out for its originality and refinement.

products.name: Chaplin
products.description: Considered the great film genius of all time, the talented Charles Chaplin was a comedian, actor, musician and filmmaker of Silent Cinema. Responsible for masterpieces of the early twentieth century and receiving a belated Oscar for the soundtrack of Limelight. The Sweet Tramp aspect of the character Carlitos did not rob him of his elegance in the way he walked, wore bowler hats and cane; Such elements were the evident inspiration of the bench that bears his name, reinforcing the playful, but at the same time elegant aspect of the piece.

products.name: Mush
products.description: ottoman Mush - High quality furniture manufactured by DK furniture in Votuporanga-SP. Sophisticated and contemporary piece that values natural design and stands out for its originality and refinement.

products.name: Serena
products.description: The Serena chaise is a Timeless and Exclusive furniture. Its structure is unique and elegant, being sophisticated and delivering not only a beautiful design, but also incredible comfort, due to its unique ergonomics. It is a piece that fills any environment, with design, comfort and translates the meaning of tranquility and well-being.

products.name: Eros
products.description: The Eros chair is a sophisticated and contemporary piece of furniture manufactured by DK Mobiliário in Votuporanga, Brazil. This high-quality chair features a unique design that combines elegance with functionality, crafted with attention to detail and superior materials to provide both comfort and style for any environment.

products.name: Slim
products.description: The Slim chair is a sophisticated and contemporary piece of furniture manufactured by DK Mobiliário in Votuporanga, Brazil. This high-quality chair features a unique design that combines elegance with functionality, crafted with attention to detail and superior materials to provide both comfort and style for any environment.

products.name: Ella
products.description: Ella is a tribute to Ella Fitzgerald, queen of Jazz. Its elongated and turned forms recall the unique musical style that unites diverse sounds, often improvised, but all brought together by the great mastery of the musicians who compose it.

products.name: Millo
products.description: Millo is a mixture of the exotic with the force of nature, and its developed forms denote power, stability and precision. Its legs are the representation of the teeth of the Smilodon (Sabretooth Tiger), an animal that carried in itself the majesty and gracefulness of the exotic, of the unique.

products.name: Tork
products.description: Chairs are essential elements for any home, it is not enough just to indulge in design, you must be attentive mainly to ergonomic aspects, since they must not only be comfortable, adding style to the space where you install them, but also be functional. With origins dating back to Ancient Egypt, such furniture represented the nobility and as the ages passed, the chairs adapted to the needs of humanity.

products.name: Collie
products.description: The Collie Chair exhibits modern, light and intelligent traits, mixing an aesthetic that favors the sense of unity, conformation and robustness. Finesse, timeless elegance and comfort are the triad that make up its intelligent design.

products.name: Linea
products.description: Simple lines joined objectively to fulfill the greater function of comfort. A chair, in addition to being beautiful, needs to hug the body, accommodate it to the point that the user stays for long hours. The delicate details, such as the laminated piece on the back and the leather cord on the arms complement the exclusive reading for a unique product.

products.description: The Dim chair is a sophisticated and contemporary piece of furniture manufactured by DK Mobiliário in Votuporanga, Brazil. products.name: Mira
products.description: The Mira Chair is a unique and sophisticated piece. Its name hints at its essence: focus and precision. Its concept is represented by the inverted V shaped feet, which play in opposite directions and interconnect harmoniously, providing stability and an exclusive design. The small button on its back symbolizes the connection between the ambiguities proposed by the piece.

products.name: Akira
products.description: The Akira Chair reflects the clarity of its Design with strong and original lines, containing an incredible lightness in all its aspect, exposing its original characteristic of sublime and unique lines.

With smooth lines and striking curves, the Naja is able to transform any environment into a space with a strong and striking personality, adding a touch of power and refinement to the décor.

products.description: Loretta Young was an actress of the great era of Hollywood cinema and owner of a classic beauty that filled the screens with the perenniality of her style. products.name: Capra
products.description: Frank Capra was a great film director who began his career in Italy and later migrated to Hollywood, where he won several Oscars with iconic films of the 1930s. Lines that fit into a minimalist but not monotonous style.

products.name: Vicky
products.description: Sinuosity in the lines is an unusual way to be composed. Vicky was born from observing haute couture clothes: elegant backs with a daring neckline, arms from which generous fabrics hang and sensual and comfortable shapes that attract the eye and the touch.

products.name: Bergman
products.description: The great Swedish actress Ingrid Bergman had such an impressive talent and beauty that she took her from Swedish cinema directly to Hollywood and later to the consecrated Italian cinema. Winner of 3 Oscars, she played several characters including the Martyr Joan of Arc. The armchair that bears his name has complex shapes that come together in a product of striking presence, exotic beauty and immense comfort. The piece has unique details in CNC machined wood and refined upholstery varying with various fabrics.

products.name: Minelli
products.description: Liza Minelli already comes from a starry cradle as she is the daughter of the great Judy Garland. Winner of Oscars and other important awards in the arts industry, she is a dancer and singer of great hits and standards of the end of the Age of Glamour of cinema. Owner of a grandiloquent style, she represents a type of theatrical luxury of Vaudeville, French Casinos and Cabarets. The armchair that bears his name also dances through the environments, being in the swivel and steering wheel versions, perfect for drink tables and conversation environments. Its dynamic shapes contrast with the solid wood detail on the back.

products.name: Aria
products.description: The Aria Armchair is a poem in the form of a piece of furniture, a harmonious blend of musical notes that come together to create a unique symphony. Its dualistic shape, which oscillates between lightness and robustness, gives the environment a sense of tranquility and security. Like a gentle breeze that floats with grace and at the same time possesses an imposing presence, the Aria is a unique work of design that captivates with its elegance and comfort.

products.name: Aura
products.description: The Aura Armchair is a striking design piece that adapts harmoniously to any environment. Its name refers to the sensation of a gentle wind, with sinuous curves that welcome and envelop like a hug. With organic and elegant shapes, Aura brings an atmosphere of comfort and tranquility to the space in which it is inserted.

products.name: Zara
products.description: The Zara Armchair is a jewel of Design. Its name refers to royalty, nobility and elegance. It has a slender soul and a unique comfort. Its design transcends function and envelops any environment with a powerful, soft and special aura.

products.name: Echo
products.description: The Echo Armchair is a piece that stands out on its own, with a design that provides unique and special comfort. Its shape is a renewal of the design concept, making it singular and timeless. With a modern and elegant design, the armchair fits perfectly in any environment, bringing a touch of sophistication and personality. It is a piece that certainly echoes through time, keeping its beauty and functionality intact.
size: PUFF – L24.4 x D29.5 x H15.7

products.name: Bloom
products.description: The Bloom armchair is a sophisticated and contemporary piece of furniture manufactured by DK Mobiliário in Votuporanga, Brazil. This high-quality armchair features a unique design that combines elegance with functionality, crafted with attention to detail and superior materials to provide both beauty and style for any environment.
